\left(\frac{p}{q}\right)\left(\frac{q}{p}\right)=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\n1 & \text { if } p \text { or } q \equiv 1(\bmod 4) \\\n-1 & \text { if } p \equiv q \equiv 3(\bmod 4)\n\end{array}\right.[imath]1 & \text { if } p \text { or } q \equiv 1(\bmod 4) [/imath] [imath]-1 & \text { if } p \equiv q \equiv 3(\bmod 4)[/imath]
